resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3124</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 24:Zodiac Zoo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Kein Zoo 24:Zodiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Aucun Zoo 24:Zodiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - Nenhum Jardim zoológico 
24:Zodiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - Nessun Giardino zoologico 
24:Zodiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - κανένας ζωολογικός κήπος 
24:Zodiac</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - Ningún Parque 
zoológico 24:Zodiac</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is an activity the student retrieves information about the Chinese Zodiac from sources on the internet and learns about characteristics of themselves,their families and famous people from the Chines.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">information retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chinese</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Aktivität, die der 
Kursteilnehmer Informationen über den chinesischen Tierkreis von den 
Quellen auf dem Internet zurückholt und über Eigenschaften von 
selbst erlernt, ihre Familien und berühmten Leute von den Chines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une activité que l'étudiant recherche des
informations sur le zodiaque chinois des sources sur l'Internet et se 
renseigne sur des caractéristiques d'elles-mêmes, leurs familles et 
personnes célèbres de Chines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este é uma atividade que o estudante recupera a 
informação sobre o zodiac chinês das fontes no Internet e a aprende
sobre características dse, seus famílias e pessoa famoso dos chines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'attività che l'allievo richiama le 
informazioni sullo zodiac cinese dalle sorgenti sul Internet e 
che impara circa le caratteristiche di se stesso, le loro famiglie e 
gente famosa dai chines.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια δραστηριότητα που ο σπουδαστής ανακτά 
τις πληροφορίες για κινεζικό zodiac από τις πηγές στο 
διαδίκτυο και μαθαίνει για τα χαρακτηριστικά τους, των οικογενειών
και των διάσημων ανθρώπων τους από τις ράχες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ésta es una actividad que el estudiante extrae 
la información sobre el zodiaco chino de fuentes en el Internet y que
aprende sobre características de sí mismos, sus familias y gente 
famosa de los lomos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Information Retrieval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierkreis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chinesisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">recherche documentaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chinois</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">recuperação de informação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Internet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chinês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
